thread.title: Drop Into Heavy Meadow With Schley and Friends
thread.title_full: Drop Into Heavy Meadow With Schley and Friends

title: Drop Into Heavy Meadow With Schley and Friends
text:
GoPro Drop Into The Heavy Meadow with Schley & Friends Day four of Richie Schley's My POV Series from Canada heli-drops us to the top of Retallack Lodge. My POV: Schley, Chase and Gulevich on Heavy Meadow © Red Bull By Scott Hart on 12 January 2017 
Climb aboard with Richie Schley , Aaron Chase and Geoff Gulevich as they freight train — riding in a tight formation with lots of speed — through the Heavy Meadow above Retallack Lodge in British Columbia. 
"This is the sub-alpine of Retallack Lodge ," says Schley of Heavy Meadow trail — one of Retallack's 62 miles of singletrack on offer in the West Kootenay region of southern British Columbia, Canada. "When you come off the peak, you're in the 'meat and potatoes' of this super fun trail — so fun, you shouldn't be able to have this much flow on a trail!" Watch the POV video below 
Come back to RedBull.com/Bike every day this week for Canada's finest trails — and watch more My POV Series videos below:
